summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NEWMECLASS education platform. All core features tested: Questions API (30 questions - 5 free + 25 paid), Login flow, User Test page, Free test completion, Test Results display, and Wallet functionality. Fixed a critical bug in Wallet.jsx where user._id was undefined (API returns 'id' not '_id').
passed_tests: GET /api/questions - returns 30 questions (5 free + 25 paid) ✓
GET /api/questions?testType=free - returns 5 free questions ✓
GET /api/questions?testType=paid - returns 25 paid questions ✓
POST /api/auth/login - successful login with testuser@newmeclass.com ✓
GET /api/auth/me - returns user profile with valid token ✓
POST /api/test-results - saves test results with analysis ✓
GET /api/test-results/{id} - retrieves specific test result ✓
GET /api/test-results/user/{userId} - retrieves user's test history ✓
GET /api/wallet/balance/{userId} - returns wallet balance ✓
GET /api/wallet/transactions/{userId} - returns transaction history ✓
POST /api/wallet/demo-topup - demo top-up works correctly ✓
Homepage loads correctly with all sections ✓
Login page displays and accepts credentials ✓
Dashboard shows user profile and test status ✓
User Test page shows free (5 questions) and paid (25 questions) options ✓
Free test flow - all 5 questions display correctly ✓
Test submission works and shows results ✓
Test Results page shows detailed analysis (personality type, strengths, areas to improve, career recommendations) ✓
Wallet page displays balance and transaction history ✓
Demo top-up functionality works correctly ✓
seed_data_creation: Test user already exists: testuser@newmeclass.com / password123
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features are working. Questions are seeded (5 free + 25 paid = 30 total). Test user credentials: testuser@newmeclass.com / password123. Wallet demo top-up is MOCKED (not real Midtrans integration). The TestResult page at /test-result/{resultId} shows detailed personality analysis including strengths, areas to improve, and career recommendations.

mocked_apis.Midtrans QRIS payment: demo-topup endpoint simulates successful payment without real Midtrans integration

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: user._id was undefined because auth API returns 'id' not '_id'
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Changed user._id to user.id || user._id in multiple places
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: Wallet page was crashing with React runtime error when trying to load balance or do top-up
Prevented potential issues with test submission
